member.name: T:Altinn.AccessManagement.Models.BaseAttributeExternal
member.summary: This model describes a an Attribute consisting of an Attribute Type and Attribute Value which can also be represented as a Urn by combining the properties as '{type}:{value}' It's used both for external API input/output but also internally for working with attributes and matching to XACML-attributes used in policies, indentifying for instance a resource, a user, a party or an action.

member.summary: Gets or sets the attribute id for the match

member.name: P:Altinn.AccessManagement.Models.BaseAttributeExternal.Value
member.summary: Gets or sets the attribute value for the match

member.name: T:Altinn.AccessManagement.Models.RevokeOfferedDelegationExternal
member.summary: Model for revoking a delegation of one or more rights a reportee has offered to another party.

member.name: P:Altinn.AccessManagement.Models.RevokeOfferedDelegationExternal.To
member.summary: Gets or sets a set of Attribute Id and Attribute Value identifying the party the delegated rights to be revoked, have been offered to.

member.name: P:Altinn.AccessManagement.Models.RevokeOfferedDelegationExternal.Rights
member.summary: Gets or sets a list of rights identifying what is to be revoked NOTE: If the right only specifies the top-level resource identifier or org/app without an action specification, the operation will find and revoke all the rights the recipient party have received for the given resource.

member.name: T:Altinn.AccessManagement.Models.RevokeReceivedDelegationExternal
member.summary: Model for revoking a delegation of one or more rights a reportee has received from another party.

member.name: P:Altinn.AccessManagement.Models.RevokeReceivedDelegationExternal.From
member.summary: Gets or sets a set of Attribute Id and Attribute Value identifying the party the delegated rights to be revoked, have been received from.

member.name: P:Altinn.AccessManagement.Models.RevokeReceivedDelegationExternal.Rights
member.summary: Gets or sets a list of rights identifying what is to be revoked NOTE: If the right only specifies the top-level resource identifier or org/app without an action specification, the operation will find and revoke all the rights received from the delegating party.

member.name: T:Altinn.AccessManagement.Models.AuthorizedPartyInput
member.summary: Input model

member.name: P:Altinn.AccessManagement.Models.AuthorizedPartyInput.OrganizationNumber
member.summary: Used to provide the organization number of the party, in combination with 'organization' as placeholder value for the {party} path parameter

member.name: P:Altinn.AccessManagement.Models.AuthorizedPartyInput.PartySSN
member.summary: Used to provide the social security number of the party, in combination with 'person' as placeholder value for the {party} path parameter

member.name: P:Altinn.AccessManagement.Models.AuthorizedPartyInput.Party
member.summary: Used to specify the reportee party the authenticated user is acting on behalf of. Can either be the PartyId, or the placeholder values: 'person' or 'organization' in combination with providing the social security number or the organization number using the header values.

member.summary: Gets or sets the set of Attribute Id and Attribute Value for a specific action, to identify the action this right applies to

member.summary: Specifies the permissions

member.summary: Gets or sets the right key

member.summary: Gets or sets the action the right gives access to perform on the resource

member.summary: Gets or sets a list of details describing the reason(s) behind the status (if any can be provided)

member.name: T:Altinn.AccessManagement.Models.RightsQueryExternal
member.summary: Queries for a list of all rights between two parties for a specific resource. If coveredby user has any key roles, those party ids should be included in the query to have the 3.0 PIP lookup rights inheirited through those as well. If offeredby is a sub unit, parenty party id should be supplied to include inheirited rights received through the main unit.

member.name: P:Altinn.AccessManagement.Models.RightsQueryExternal.From
member.summary: Gets or sets the set of Attribute Id and Attribute Value for the entity having offered rights

member.name: P:Altinn.AccessManagement.Models.RightsQueryExternal.To
member.summary: Gets or sets the set of Attribute Id and Attribute Value for the entity having received rights

member.name: P:Altinn.AccessManagement.Models.RightsQueryExternal.Resource
member.summary: Gets or sets the set of Attribute Id and Attribute Value for identifying the resource the rights

member.name: T:Altinn.AccessManagement.Core.Models.AuthorizedPartyExternal
member.summary: Model representing an authorized party, meaning a party for which the subject which has been authorized, has received one or more rights (either directly or through role(s), rightspackages). Used in new implementation of what has previously been named ReporteeList in Altinn 2.

member.name: P:Altinn.AccessManagement.Core.Models.AuthorizedPartyExternal.PartyUuid
member.summary: Gets or sets the universally unique identifier of the party

member.name: P:Altinn.AccessManagement.Core.Models.AuthorizedPartyExternal.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the party

member.name: P:Altinn.AccessManagement.Core.Models.AuthorizedPartyExternal.OrganizationNumber
member.summary: Gets the organization number if the party is an organization

member.name: P:Altinn.AccessManagement.Core.Models.AuthorizedPartyExternal.PersonId
member.summary: Gets the national identity number if the party is a person

member.name: P:Altinn.AccessManagement.Core.Models.AuthorizedPartyExternal.PartyId
member.summary: Gets or sets the party id

member.name: P:Altinn.AccessManagement.Core.Models.AuthorizedPartyExternal.Type
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of party

member.summary: Gets or sets the unit type if the party is an organization

member.name: P:Altinn.AccessManagement.Core.Models.AuthorizedPartyExternal.IsDeleted
member.summary: Gets or sets whether this party is marked as deleted in the Central Coordinating Register for Legal Entities

member.name: P:Altinn.AccessManagement.Core.Models.AuthorizedPartyExternal.OnlyHierarchyElementWithNoAccess
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the party is only included as a hierarchy element without any access. Meaning a main unit where the authorized subject only have access to one or more of the subunits.

member.name: P:Altinn.AccessManagement.Core.Models.AuthorizedPartyExternal.AuthorizedResources
member.summary: Gets or sets a collection of all resource identifier the authorized subject has some access to on behalf of this party

member.name: P:Altinn.AccessManagement.Core.Models.AuthorizedPartyExternal.AuthorizedRoles
member.summary: Gets or sets a collection of all rolecodes for roles from either Enhetsregisteret or Altinn 2 which the authorized subject has been authorized for on behalf of this party

member.name: P:Altinn.AccessManagement.Core.Models.AuthorizedPartyExternal.Subunits
member.summary: Gets or sets a set of subunits of this party, which the authorized subject also has some access to.

member.summary: Default HTTP header for Organization number input

member.summary: Validates that a given organization number is valid.

member.summary: Validates that a given social security number is valid.

member.name: M:Altinn.AccessManagement.Utilities.IdentifierUtil.GetIdentifierAsAttributeMatch(System.String,Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.HttpContext)
member.summary: Route allowes for specifying the reportee party in the path. This value must either be a PartyId, or the placeholder values: "organization" or "person" if the placeholder value is used the organization number or social security number must be specified in a corresponding header value: "Altinn-Party-OrganizationNumber" or "Altinn-Party-SocialSecurityNumber"
member.param: The httpcontext for getting header values
member.returns: AttributeMatch model representation of the identifier
